snippet: Jodie Foster came out as gay, sort of, in her speech at the Golden Globes, but was more elliptical than loud and proud.
abstract: Alessandra Stanley TV Watch column remarks on Jodi Foster's ambiguous public acknowledgement of her homosexuality while accepting Golden Globe award for lifetime achievement.
lead_paragraph: Jodie Foster came out as gay, sort of, in her speech at the Golden Globes, but was more elliptical than loud and proud.

headline.seo: Jodie Foster Lifts a Veil at Golden Globes
headline.main: The Lifting of a Veil, Discreetly
headline.print_headline: The Lifting Of a Veil, Discreetly
